elements.title: Frankee Connolly (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Frankee Connolly (pictured) signed to Xenomania and took her first singing lessons – in that order?

elements.title: tufted jays (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that almost all members of a flock of tufted jays work together to build a nest?

elements.title: Sarah McCreanor (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Sarah McCreanor imitates objects under hydraulic presses through dance?

elements.title: Gilpatrick Hotel (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that former US president Theodore Roosevelt was shot in front of the Gilpatrick Hotel in 1912?

elements.title: Tamer Balcı (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Olympic hammer thrower Tamer Balcı was later cast in a movie as Tarzan?

elements.title: TV stations in Nashville (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that TV stations in Nashville and in Memphis, Tennessee, both on channel 30, lost their Fox affiliations in 1990?

elements.title: Wakan (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the mild climate in the remote mountain village of Wakan in Oman allows the growth of fruits such as pomegranates in an otherwise hot and dry country?

elements.title: Brad Kragthorpe (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that football player Brad Kragthorpe played in an exhibition game named after his grandfather?
